nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hi Person1 / Person2  This is Person3I am just following up on the potential for a rehab visit for Person4  I just spoke to Person4 and I understand that Dr Person5 has not yet initiated the appeal with Org7  As we are now 3 weeks since Person4 you and I spoke I would really appreciate it if you could get Dr Person5 to commit to this process. As a reminder we need to find a way to get Person4 into rehab for his own benefit and so that we can make the home adjustments to his bathroom to support his independence and his mobility. Please can you give me a call on XXX-XXX-XXXX to let me know what action Dr Person5 will be taking on this topic. Many thanks an d Happy Holidays  Person6
